subject: Group Booking Questions
body: Hi there, I'm planning a trip for a group of 15 friends to Cancun and was wondering if there are any group discounts. Also, is it possible to arrange private transportation from the airport? Oh, and actually, can you also suggest some activities for a group this size? Thanks! - Sent from my iPhone

subject: Change in Plans - Need Assistance
body: Hello, I hope this finds you well. I'm writing to amend my booking reference ABC12345. I need to change the departure date to next Thursday. Additionally, could you upgrade one of the rooms to a suite? And if it's not too much trouble, cancel the airport shuttle service. Thanks in advance for your help. Regards, Michael

subject: Urgent: Cancellation Request
body: Dear Support, Due to the recent hurricane warnings, I need to cancel my trip to Miami. My reference is 789XYZ. Could you please confirm the cancellation at your earliest convenience? Also, kindly advise on your cancellation policy regarding such weather events. Thank you. Susan

subject: Special Request for Upcoming Trip
body: Hello, I'm traveling with my grandmother who requires wheelchair access. Could you ensure that our hotel room is equipped accordingly? Also, we have dietary restrictions, so could you inform us about the available meal options? Booking ref: DEF45678. Thanks a lot! David

subject: Baggage Allowance Clarification
body: Hi, I need some info on the baggage policy for flight 123 to Paris. Is there a fee for oversized bags? And what about sports equipment like skis? Would appreciate a prompt response. Best, Chloe

subject: Missed Connection - Immediate Help Needed
body: Hello Support, Unfortunately, I missed my connecting flight to Tokyo due to a delay. Could you assist with rebooking the earliest possible flight? I'm stuck at the airport, and it's quite urgent. My ref: GH23456. Thanks, Tariq

subject: Request for Refund
body: To whom it may concern, I am seeking a refund for my cancelled trip to Rome, ref: 5678XYZC. I have attached the payment receipt here, but it seems like the file isn't uploading. Could you guide me on the process? Thank you. Linda

subject: Price Inquiry and Promotions
body: Hello, I came across a promotional deal on your website for Bali vacations but couldn't find details on group rates. Can you confirm if this applies to a family of five? Looking forward to your reply. Regards, Emma

subject: Travel Insurance Coverage
body: Hi, I'd like to know if my current travel insurance covers pre-existing conditions. Also, could you provide details on coverage for multi-trip plans? Thanks, Rajiv

subject: Loyalty Program Points Question
body: Hello, I've been a member of your loyalty program for a while now, but I noticed my points haven't updated since my last trip. Could you clarify the current balance? Thanks, Anna

subject: Feedback on Recent Trip
body: Hi, I'm writing to share feedback on my recent stay at your hotel in Barcelona. While the staff was friendly, the room wasn't cleaned properly. I've attached photos - or I thought I did, but they seem to be missing. Could someone address this? John

subject: Lost Item Inquiry
body: Dear Support, I left my Kindle in room 312 during my stay at your NYC hotel. Could you check with housekeeping? If found, could you ship it to my address on file? Much appreciated. Sophie

subject: Re: Group Booking Details
body: Hi there, I was just reviewing our group booking for the family reunion trip in August, and I noticed that we have a mix-up with the dates. Also, my cousin just found out she can't eat gluten, so can we make sure her meals are gluten-free? Oh, and while I'm at it, do you have any recommendations for kid-friendly activities in the area? Thanks! - Emily

subject: Change in Itinerary
body: Hello, I need to adjust my travel plans. My flight on the 15th needs to be moved to the 17th instead, and if possible, could you also change my hotel reservation to reflect these new dates? By the way, I might need to cancel the car rental, but let me confirm that later. Appreciate your help, David.

subject: URGENT: Cancellation Request
body: Hi, I need to cancel our booking due to a family emergency. We were supposed to fly out next week. I understand there might be fees, but given the circumstances, is there anything you can do? I really hope for a quick response. Thanks, Laura.

subject: Special Request for Upcoming Trip
body: Dear Support, I'm writing to ensure that my room is equipped with a prayer mat and that I have access to halal meals throughout my stay. Additionally, I would appreciate a room close to the elevator as my mother has difficulty walking long distances. Thank you for your understanding. Best, Mohammed.

subject: Baggage Inquiry
body: Hi, I need clarification regarding the baggage policy. My suitcase is a bit larger than the standard size. Will there be any additional charges, and if so, how much? Also, do you have any special handling procedures for musical instruments? Thanks, Anna.

subject: Re: Missed Connection Assistance
body: Hello, I missed my connection due to a delay on my first flight. Is there any way you can assist with rebooking? I'm currently stuck at the airport and really need to get to my destination by tomorrow. Also, what are the options for compensation? Looking forward to a swift reply. Regards, Michael.

subject: Follow-Up on Refund Request
body: Hello again, I reached out last week regarding a refund for my cancelled trip. I haven't heard back and it's quite urgent as the funds are needed for another booking. Can you please update me on the status? I can provide the payment proof again if necessary. Thank you, Jessica.

subject: Question About Current Promotions
body: Hi! I saw a promo for holiday travel on your website, but I'm not quite sure about the details. Is it applicable for group bookings too? Also, are there any other discounts we could stack with this offer? Much appreciated! Cheers, Chris.

subject: Travel Insurance Clarification
body: Dear Support, I want to ensure my travel insurance covers pre-existing conditions. Could you provide detailed information on this? Additionally, I plan to travel multiple times this year; is there a multi-trip insurance option? Thanks in advance, Wendy.

subject: Loyalty Program Inquiry
body: Hi, I've been a member of your loyalty program for a while now. Could you explain how my points are calculated and if they will expire soon? Also, is there a way to upgrade my status for better benefits? Thanks for your help. Regards, John.

subject: Feedback on Recent Stay
body: Hello, I recently stayed at your hotel and wanted to provide some feedback. The staff was great, but there were issues with the room cleanliness. I've mentioned this when I checked out, but I feel it needs to be addressed. I hope for better service next time. Best, Susan.

subject: Lost Item: Urgent Assistance Required
body: Hi, I left my laptop bag at your hotel in room 304 during my stay last week. It's urgent that I get it back as it contains important documents. Could you check with the housekeeping staff and arrange for it to be shipped to my address? I'll cover the shipping costs. Thanks, Paul.

subject: Subject: Group Trip Details Needed
body: Hi there, I'm planning a trip for a group of 12 friends to Bali from June 10-20, 2024. Can you provide details on group discounts and any special activities we could arrange? Also, Sarah mentioned she might want to join later. Can we add her to the booking last minute? Thanks, James

subject: Subject: Urgent: Change of Flight Date
body: Hello, I need to change my flight from NYC to Paris on Nov 12th to Nov 14th. Also, I'm considering staying an extra day in Paris. How does this affect the hotel reservation? Booking ref: NYCPAR2023. Regards, Linda

subject: Subject: Immediate Cancellation Due to Health
body: Hi, I need to cancel my trip to Tokyo scheduled for next week due to a medical emergency. I understand the policy might not allow refunds this late, but I hope you can consider my situation. Please advise. Michael

subject: Subject: Special Meal Request for Flight
body: Hello, Could you please ensure that my meal preference for the flight is set to vegan? Additionally, my son has a peanut allergy, so please make sure his meal is nut-free. Thank you! Rachel

subject: Subject: Baggage Allowance Clarification
body: Greetings, I'm flying to London next month and need to know the baggage allowance for economy class. Also, is there a fee for carrying a musical instrument? Thanks, Tom

subject: Subject: Help! Missed Connection
body: Dear Support, I missed my connecting flight to Madrid due to a delay. Can you please help me rebook? I'm at JFK airport now. Need urgent assistance! Regards, Anna

subject: Subject: Refund Request - Double Booking Error
body: Hi team, I accidentally booked two rooms for my stay in Rome. Could you please process a refund for one of them? Booking IDs: RM2023-11A and RM2023-11B. Appreciate your help, Kevin

subject: Subject: Inquiry About Holiday Discounts
body: Hello, I'm interested in any holiday promotions you might have for family trips to Hawaii in December. Also, do you have any bundled deals with activities included? Best, Susan

subject: Subject: Travel Insurance Coverage for Adventure Sports
body: Hi, Does the travel insurance included in my package cover activities like scuba diving and rock climbing? If not, how can I upgrade? Thanks, David

subject: Subject: Missing Points in Loyalty Account
body: Hello, I noticed my recent trip to Dubai didn't add any points to my loyalty account. Can you check why? Also, when do my current points expire? Thanks, Chris

subject: Subject: Feedback on Recent Trip
body: Hi, I recently returned from a trip to Greece, and I wanted to share some feedback. While the hotel was great, the local tour was not as expected. Can someone get in touch to discuss? Best, Emily

subject: Subject: Lost Item on Flight
body: Subject: Lost Item on Flight;Hi, I left my Kindle on flight AA123 from LA to JFK on Oct 1st. Could you help me retrieve it? It has a red cover. Many thanks, Mark

subject: Group booking inquiry
body: Hi there, I'm reaching out to get some info on booking a group trip for our book club. We're about 15 people, but there might be a few last-minute additions. What are the rates and policies for adding more people later? Thanks, Jenny

subject: Change my booking details
body: Hello, I'm writing to request some changes to my booking ref: XKJ12345. Could we switch from a double to a family room and also alter the check-in date to March 5th instead of the 4th? Oh, and if there's a cancellation fee, let me know. Cheers, Liam

subject: Urgent cancellation
body: Subject: URGENT: Cancel My Booking!\nHi, due to an unforeseen emergency, I need to cancel my reservation ASAP. It's under ref: 987PLK. I read through your policy, and it mentions force majeure situations, so I'm hoping for a full refund. Please confirm. Regards, Nina

subject: Special request for upcoming trip
body: Good day, I have a booking upcoming (ref: 1122ABC) and need to request a wheelchair-accessible room as I'll be traveling with my elderly mother. Also, do you offer any special meals for diabetics on flights? Thank you, Peter

subject: Baggage size and fee query
body: Hi, I'm flying out to Paris next week and was wondering about the baggage policy. Specifically, what's the charge for a 25kg bag? And is there any way to carry my guitar on board? Let me know. Regards, Sara

subject: Missed connection problem
body: Hello, I missed my connecting flight from NYC to LA due to a delay. My booking reference is 456XYZ. Can you help me get rebooked, and is there any compensation for the inconvenience? Thanks in advance, David

subject: Refund process query
body: Hi, I was promised a refund for booking ref: 7755LMN two weeks ago. Haven't seen it in my account yet. Could you check on this? It's quite urgent as I need the funds for another urgent trip. Looking forward to your response. Lucy

subject: Pricing on group discounts and promotions
body: Hey, I saw a promotion on your site for family trips but couldn't find details for groups. We're planning a reunion, and I'd like to know if we can get a discount. Also, are there any seasonal offers coming up? Cheers, Noah

subject: Travel insurance coverage details
body: Hi there, I'm considering your travel insurance for an upcoming trip but have a few questions. Does it cover pre-existing conditions, and how about multi-trip options? Also, what's the claim process like? Thanks, Emily

subject: Loyalty points query
body: Hello, I have a question about my loyalty points. It seems like some points from my last trip to Tokyo haven't been credited. Could you check? My member ID is 123456. Also, when do they expire? Thanks, Matthew

subject: Feedback on recent stay
body: Subject: Feedback on my recent stay\nHi, I'd like to provide some feedback regarding my recent stay at your hotel. While the staff were friendly, the room was not cleaned properly. I had to call twice for housekeeping. Could you improve this? Thanks, Olivia

subject: Lost item during stay
body: Hi, I stayed at your hotel last week and realized I left my Kindle in the room. Can you check if it's been found? I stayed in room 302, checked out on the 25th. Please let me know how I can have it sent back. Much appreciated, Jackson

subject: Group trip query
body: Hi there, I hope this finds you well! We're planning a family reunion for about 15 people, and I was wondering if you offer any group discounts? Actually, wait, while I'm asking, could you also let me know about any nearby attractions suitable for kids? Thanks! Best, Jess

subject: Change in plans
body: Greetings, I recently booked a flight with ref #AB123XY for the 10th, but I need to change it to the 12th. Also, can I upgrade to business class? If it's not available, just the date change is fine. Cheers, Michael

subject: Urgent cancellation
body: Subject: Immediate Attention Required - Cancellation Request! Hi, due to an unexpected family emergency, I need to cancel my entire booking (ref: PQ456RT) for next week. I'm aware of the 24-hour policy and hope for a full refund. Please confirm ASAP. Thanks, Laura

subject: Special accommodation
body: Hello, I have a booking for 2 adults and 1 child under ref #XYZ123. Could you arrange a crib in the room and ensure it's in a non-smoking area? Also, my wife follows a gluten-free diet; any meal options? Regards, Amir

subject: Baggage allowance inquiry
body: Hi, I’m flying to NY next week, and I need to know the baggage allowance for oversized items. Also, what are the fees if I exceed the limit? Thanks in advance, Sarah

subject: Missed flight help
body: Hi, I missed my connection due to a delay in the first leg of my trip (flight ref: 789GH). Can you assist with rebooking the next available flight? I'm currently stuck at the airport. Thanks, David

subject: Refund request
body: Hello, I was supposed to travel on the 5th (ref: QR2345), but the flight was canceled. I haven’t received my refund yet. Could you update me on the status? My bank details are the same as before. Best, Nina

subject: Promo code query
body: Hey! I noticed a promo code for 15% off summer bookings on your website. Can you confirm if it's applicable for flights in July? Also, do you offer student discounts? Thanks! Tom

subject: Insurance clarification
body: Hi, I’m considering your travel insurance plan but need to confirm if it covers pre-existing conditions. Also, how does it work for multi-trip coverage? Awaiting your guidance, Zara

subject: Loyalty points confusion
body: Subject: Loyalty Points Discrepancy Hi, I noticed my recent flight didn’t accrue any points despite booking through my account (ID: MR987). Could you check and update my points? Thanks, Mike

subject: Feedback on recent trip
body: Hi, I wanted to provide some feedback about my recent trip. While the hotel was great, the transfer service was delayed, causing inconvenience. Hoping for better coordination next time. Thanks, Emily

subject: Lost item recovery
body: Hello, I left my jacket on flight #1234 on Oct 2nd. It’s a black leather jacket with my initials JT inside. Is there a way to recover it? Please let me know the process. Regards, John
